title: India : number of internet users 2015 to 2023
yAxis: Number of internet users in millions
summary: In general Number of internet users in millions has rose over the Year.
Number of internet users in millions is slightly increasing from 2015 to 2018, and finally roughly constant from 2018 to 2022.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest Number of internet users in millions, of value 634.9 was reached at Year 2022
The lowest Number of internet users in millions, of value 259.88 was reported at Year 2015
